BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Bronx Democratic County Committee  - Submitting for the Advice & Consent of the Council, the name of Naomi Silie, for appointment as the Bronx County Democratic Commissioner of Elections, pursuant to Section 3 – 204 (2) of the Election Law.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Naomi Silie, Bronx County Democratic Commissioner of Elections

Items.Title: Resolution adding a rule to the Rules of the Council in relation to the Qualifications of Council Members.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Adding a rule to the Rules of the Council in relation to the Qualifications of Council Members.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
Resolution adding a rule to the Rules of the Council in relation to the Qualifications of Council Members.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Adding a rule to the Rules of the Council in relation to the Qualifications of Council Members.

Items.Title: Communication from the Bronx Democratic County Committee  - Submitting for the Advice & Consent of the Council, the name of Naomi Silie, for appointment as the Bronx County Democratic Commissioner of Elections, pursuant to Section 3 – 204 (2) of the Election Law.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Communication be P-C Item Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Naomi Silie, Bronx County Democratic Commissioner of Elections

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Foster, Arroyo, Koppell and Palma
